entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Wasagaming
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:39 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -22.5°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 32 with temperature rising to minus 25 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 32 with temperature rising to minus 25 by morning. Wind chill minus 44 this evening. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 16.
